description: On this page you will find out about my recent activities (tech-related), not only my projects, but also hackathons and events I have attended (if I remember to keep this updated.)
Detective Hammer is a bot that allows people to moderate their own Discord servers. It detects spam links and deletes them. The bot is also customizable, you can choose your own spam words.

Sorinxv.com is my current portfolio. Since it's a personal project I've been working on my own, this website allowed me to learn more about performance, search engine optimization and servers, since it's my first website hosted on a private server
tech: Built with Reactjs, no css libraries
